body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Michael Evans and the customer's name is Patricia Wood.  The conversation is about Mels Cars (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling XYZ Solutions. My name is Sarah. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, I need some help with my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, I'd be happy to help. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. To access your account, I'll need to verify a few details. Could you please provide your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's January second, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Could you also provide the last four digits of your social security number?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, John. I have successfully accessed your account. How can I assist you further today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I need to update my mailing address.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. I can help you with that. Please provide your new mailing address.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's one two three four Elm Street, Springfield, IL.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. Your address has been updated in our system. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you, Sarah.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for calling XYZ Solutions. Have a great day! Goodbye.
